idea-plugin.name: Copy File Content
idea-plugin.description:
The "Copy File Content" plugin enhances your workflow by allowing you to quickly copy the contents of selected files and directories to the clipboard, formatted according to customizable settings.

This plugin is useful for:

  • developers who frequently need to share their code via chat applications
  • developers who needs to copy their code to build context for LLM apps like ChatGPT, Gemini or Sapiens.

Main features:

  • Copy the content of multiple files to the clipboard
  • Customizable text structure, including pre-text, file header text and post-text
  • Configurable file copying constraint, default to 30 files, so you don't experience memory problems if your folder have more files than you anticipated
  • Optionally set filters to specify which file extensions should be copied.
  • Information on thh copied items including number of files copied, total lines, total words and an estimate over the tokens for the copied content (it consider words and some punctuations).

action.description: Copy folder and file content to the clipboard.
